Text: Why force to open an account before sending out the links ?.. SCAM .. maybe if you shared and supported I might have given it a try .. PURE SCAM .. !!
Where I'm from, a scam is when you charge something for a worthless thing. In this case I don't charge anything for some of the most valuable forex trading tools.
I ask people to open an account with ZuluTrade using my affiliate link so I can get a commission on their trades ... what's wrong with that ? It won't cost you anything at all.
